title.rendered: How Technology Has Changed Online Gambling

content.rendered:
How Technology Has Changed Online Gambling

The casino and gambling industry are ever-changing. With the continuous introduction of new technologies, the online gambling industry is becoming a gift that keeps on giving, especially among avid players and the new wave of tech-savvy online gamers. 

Gambling has adjusted well with the times. Developers are successfully integrating technological advancements to deliver the best gaming experience among patrons and are fast encouraging the younger generation to try out online gambling, too. Technological advancements deliver easy accessibility, enhanced gaming experience, and improved casino services just to name a few.

Today, online gambling is more accessible than ever before. And with the rise of more advanced technologies, you can only expect nothing but a more immersive gaming experience for old casino gamers and newbies alike. 

The Present Online Gambling Landscape

The fast growth of the Internet and easy accessibility offered by mobile devices such as smartphones and tablets have made it possible for online gambling to have a wider reach. Casinos need to adjust to fast times by integrating technology into all aspects of the gaming experience. Online poker is still one of the most popular forms of online casino gaming for many years and until now. At present, online poker has undergone several iterations that it offers multiple features which deliver a realistic experience like playing at an actual casino table. 

Technology is also essential in the development of new games. Online casino gamers now discover many exciting and immersive games on different platforms developed by a long list of software providers. Breakthrough advancements in the gaming industry allow players to take advantage of multiple perks including NO download requirements, free slot games and NO registration. These benefits allow players to test slots and other casino games without depositing money or creating an account. 

New online games that feature advanced technologies showcase immersive gaming experiences to players. Apart from amazing animation and cutting-edge graphics, there are also bonus features and enhanced gameplay that provide players with more chances of winning. 

The Impact of Technology on Brick-and-Mortar Casinos

Land-based casinos offer a handful of advantages to their patrons. For one, there is that unique experience of touching and feeling the cards on your palm, being seated on the tables, rolling dice, and the overall thrilling and cohesive playing environment. Naturally, these attributes are missing from online casinos, but online gamers are now discovering games that are innovative and technologically advanced that deliver the same level of excitement as that of land-based casinos. 

Land-based casinos are also utilizing technological innovations in many aspects of their operations. For instance, land-based casinos offer players touch screen kiosks for points redemption, placing wagers, and evaluating player accounts. 

Wider Reach

Before technological advancements were incorporated into casino gaming, only old-school gamers can be found in actual casinos. But since its introduction to the online landscape, gambling has successfully tapped into new markets, hence enjoying a wider audience. If you have access to the Internet, you can be the next to discover the thrill and excitement of online casino gaming. 

Online casinos have united casino gamers from all over the world in one convenient platform. This means that the gamer beside you in an online poker table might be residing halfway around the globe. Players can play with family, friends, and strangers. About 63.4% of mobile device owners gain access to the Internet through their mobile phones. Android is the most popular operating platform going. A lot of operators have developed dedicated sports betting apps just for the platform. The number of people playing casino games using their mobile devices are showing a steady increase over the years. Regardless of your location, you can play casino games using your mobile phone and a trusty Internet connection. 

Highly Convenient Platform

Online gaming is highly sought-after primarily for the convenience that it consistently delivers when compared alongside land-based casinos. Casino gamers don’t have to go out of their homes and use real money physically to enjoy casino gaming. 

With technology, players can now experience online casino gaming from anywhere in the world and play and win real cash. Also, players gain access to online casinos round the clock. Players may also gain access to online casinos using various equipment including smartphones, tablets, desktop computers, and laptops to play their favourite slot or table games. 

Technology is making a significant impact on the gambling industry and expect it to drive the industry to grow bigger and better. Every day, new online gaming sites are launching with game developers offering unique and exciting games to players. The popularity of online gaming integrated with technological advancements has also influenced the mobile casino realm.

Online games that were previously made with Flash are now being developed using HTML5 technology. This allows for players to use operating systems of their own choosing to access their favourite casino games. It eliminates the need to download software programs to play online using mobile devices. 

The online gaming world is dynamic, to say the least. It is continuously changing and fast-evolving to keep up with the times. Truly, technological advancements have not only made an impact on online gaming, but land-based casinos are also gaining benefits from the introduction of new technologies regularly. 

Increased Portability

The introduction of smartphone technology has made gambling a highly-portable activity that players can carry out virtually anywhere, from the comfort of your own home to while you are on daily commutes. Due to technology, it is not easy and simple to play the latest free slots and tables games on the go. 

With online casino games readily accessible in both apps and through web browsers, every gambling style that you can think of is now available through smartphones and tablets. Several online sites have fully-optimized versions that can detect whenever a player is on their phone and automatically adapts the format and layout accordingly for an enhanced casino gaming experience. 

While more people are accessing online casinos – an estimated 164 million players – land-based casinos and sports betting shops are seeing a sharp decrease. The challenge that land-based casinos and betting shops face is that the convenience of online casinos makes it possible for gamers to play games on their phones any time of day and wherever they are in the globe. Consequently, land-based casino patrons are not granted the opportunity to place bets at actual shops whenever they want to due to limited store hours. 

To try to fight this challenge, betting shops are now integrating technology into their service, too. The addition of touchscreens to their betting kiosks combines the social aspect of gambling and the convenience of technology. Many betting shops are also integrating technological advancements with in-person experience, such as scanning loyalty cards and accepting cash to name a few. 

Reduced Security Issues

One great advantage that brick-and-mortar bookmakers have over online betting platforms is security. Many players fear that online hackers might take advantage of identity issues or that online betting results in overspending, while in-store betting helps customers alleviate that risk. 

Concerns over security arise especially when transferring money or depositing money to online accounts. Thousands of people send or receive money through online platforms, which warrants for more security and safety protocols of platforms including online casinos. There will always be room for insecurities and threats in operation, especially in the online gambling industry. With the utilization of technology, some of these security issues have successfully been alleviated. 

However, the big and small progress in the technology industry has found ways to improve security when playing casino games and betting online. Site developers are constantly reassessing their systems and security protocols so that users feel safe knowing their money remains secure online. Given the rise in popularity of online gaming, there seems to be no sign of business stopping their complete integration of technology-driven gambling as casino games and apps are always improving, resulting in greater user experience. 

When playing online casino games, players do not have to worry about the safety and security of their financial information given most online casino sites are authorized by licensed gaming authorities. The majority, if not all, of online casino platforms, are installed with software programs that can easily detect fraudulent or illegal activities, hence offering complete security at all times. Websites are also being proactive in educating users about the regulations, terms, and agreements in the gambling community. Technology has made it possible for players to feel extra safe when playing online games and betting in sports, too.

Innovative Marketing Strategy

All aspects of operations, including styles and features, are now more sophisticated and exciting since technologies were integrated into the gambling world. Marketing business is an integral part of operations, especially in the gambling industry, as it helps sustain and grow their respective gaming platforms. 

For online casino sites or firms, it can be a bit challenging to market themselves given the limitation on publishing ads on TV, radio, and newspaper. Luckily, technology has brought changes to the marketing operations of online sites. Today, gambling firms can market their services without regulations and reach a wider audience across the globe.

What Can We Expect from the Gambling Industry Given the Introduction of Newer Technologies?

Since the introduction of the first online gaming sites, the online casino has not attempted to look back. With advancements in technology, online gambling has poised itself to be a favourite among many gamblers. In the past decade, online gambling has witnessed tremendous growth in all aspects.

It has been successful in attracting more traditional gamblers who have always been challenged with access to land-based casinos or sports betting bookies. With the introduction of mobile phones, online casino developers launched casino apps that offer slots online, poker games, and other popular casino games, too.

Changes will be constant as the online casino world is delivering new technologies regularly. Some experts believe that the online gaming experience will be more fun, immersive and exciting with the introduction of the latest IT innovations.  

Here are just some of the innovations in technology that can affect and are starting to influence the gambling world. 

Cryptocurrency

Cryptocurrency or digital money is an element that can change the way players gamble online. Cryptocurrency markets itself as a safe and secure way of transacting for products and services online. Since most online gamers yearn for secure transactions whenever they are online gaming, cryptocurrencies offer a fast and easy solution. 

Online casino players from countries where gambling is banned can use cryptocurrencies to transfer funds, so they can play casino games and place bets on sporting events, too. Blockchain technology in cryptocurrency is proven 100% safe and it won’t leave a trace or paper trail of the users, making it impossible for hackers to track their financial information altogether. 

Several online gambling platforms are already offering payment solutions through Bitcoin and other popular cryptocurrencies. Don’t be shocked when one day, all online casinos and apps start enforcing cryptocurrency as their preferred method of deposit and withdrawal options. 

VR Headsets and AR Technology

Every IT enterprise is slowly adopting to virtual reality these days. VR headsets for mobile phones have already been available for the past few years. Apple is developing AR technologies in the gaming world, and just like the social media giant Facebook, is going to launch its own VR and AR headsets soon. YouTube already expressed their support for VR videos and now, online casinos are also rendering support for VR to further enhance the online gambling experience. 

Conclusions

Technology is all around us. It is making our lives easier and more comfortable. From food delivery apps to online shopping, anything that you will ever need and want is at your fingertips. The gambling industry is keeping up by integrating all advanced technological innovations to enhance user experience and to attract more customers in the process. 

The introduction of advanced technologies such as AI and Microgaming to name a few will surely make a huge difference in the gambling world and to its bright future. Truly, online casino games have created themselves as the preferred platform for most gamers, thanks to advanced technology.
